SEED SPOT's mission is to educate, accelerate, and invest in entrepreneurs who are creating solutions to social problems.We are making an impact in Phoenix and creating change in the lives of people and communities around the world.Have a dream to change the world? Apply to a SEED SPOT program at www.seedspot.org!

LocalWork.com is an online job board that matches candidates with employers based on company culture, including shared values, company purpose, and work environment. My role with LocalWork.com was to help define and validate the specific, differentiated value proposition for both job seekers and employers, design messaging, create a content strategy, establish an online social/blog presence, contribute to the UX/UI of the online and mobile experiences, and position the company for funding.
High Tide Program Director & Sr. Venture Associate

Directed Tallwave’s High Tide Accelerator. High Tide was a three-month program that taught tech startups how to build a successful business, not just a great product. Startups selected for High Tide received tools & resources, education, mentorship, a kick-ass advisor network, and hands-on help "moving big rocks" inside their company. By the end of the program, founders were prepared for funding, equipped with:  - killer pitch  - world class due diligence materials  - full financial model & go-to-market strategy  - customized Capital Machine that's proven to secure more meetings with targeted investors than      standard fundraising techniques.Learn more at www.tallwavehightide.com

Tallwave is a commercializor.The company creates commercial success and shareholder value for entrepreneurs and investors by validating, scaling and managing early-stage and growth ventures with a hands-on approach. What separates Tallwave from the limitations of Incubator, Accelerator and traditional Venture Capital firm business models is its proprietary Tallwave Way™ closed-loop commercialization engine. The combination of Tallwave’s lean Business Blueprint™ for product and company validation, its Operator Model™ for resource deployment and the access to pre-seed through Series A capital its networks provide, has been used to vet over 300 entrepreneurs and their concepts, validate more than 65 startups, and build a portfolio of half a dozen early-stage companies.Founded and led by former iCrossing, Google, Yahoo!, Microsoft, GoDaddy and Marketwire executives, Tallwave is headquartered in Scottsdale, AZ with offices in Los Angeles and San Francisco. Twice a year, Tallwave hosts High Tide™, one of the most innovative startup competitions in the U.S. Additional information about Tallwave is available at www.tallwave.com.

It is my pleasure to write a recommendation for the 2010|11 Ad2 Tucson Public Service Co-Chair Lauren McDanell. Through her efforts, our organization was able to take on not only one, but two, non profits to partner with in our pro-bono efforts. Lauren exudes the utmost professionalism, encourages fresh ideas and displayed the hard work ethic which truly raised the bar for all of our future non profit campaign projects. Ad2 Tucson is truly thankful to Lauren and all of her efforts, and as such she was recently elected to be an official member of the board of directions for the 2011|12 board year.

Jesse Randall, Tbird
Deviant Strategist | Start-up Junkie | Scaling Human-to-Human Communications
October 10, 2014, Lauren reported directly to Jesse

Jesse and I worked together at Tallwave where he was a Director in Finance and Operations and served as my direct manager for over 30 client projects.  Jesse had the unique ability to both create effective customized solutions for each client, as well as design systems and processes that instantly became repeatable "staples" in every engagement.  One of Jesse's greatest contributions to Tallwave was building the foundation for venture capital-grade financial and operational modeling. These techniques were used to create customized offerings for over 50 clients with unique business models, verticals, and market penetration strategies. The financial model was frequently the aspect of an engagement where clients found the most value. On top of that, Jesse was an excellent, committed manager who grew over half of his managed team of 7 associates to Director level or higher in less than a year.  Jesse is a joy to work with and would make an invaluable addition to any team.

summary: Entrepreneurial, results-oriented critical thinker who excels in brand management and research-driven product development.  Experienced in designing, uncovering, and interpreting a broad range of market research and trend analysis and transforming data into succinct, actionable recommendations.  Expert in designing products and messaging for a wide range of target markets, as well as packaging, online experiences, and integrated marketing campaigns.Specialties: Branding and identity, product development, consumer insights, project management, written and verbal communication, brainstorming and creative labs, client presentations and trade shows, and collaboration between creative, sales, and logistics teams.Excellent interpersonal & communication skills; proven ability to engage others and establish buy-inInventive & entrepreneurial; strong creative & problem solving ability coupled with analytic/research background
